input:
Alice, Bob, and Claire are on the same team in a soccer match. At the start of the match, they are each assigned to a position: Alice is playing left midfielder, Bob is playing goalkeeper, and Claire is playing right winger.
As the game progresses, pairs of players occasionally swap positions. First, Claire and Bob trade positions. Then, Claire and Alice trade positions. Finally, Alice and Bob trade positions. At the end of the match, Bob is playing
Options:
(A) left midfielder
(B) goalkeeper
(C) right winger
